title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Singing) We wish you a merry Christmas, We wish you a merry Christmas, We wish you a merry Christmas and a happy New Year!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The SONG ENDS and little Stan steps out in front of the group.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Lights please?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The lights dim, and a small spotlight appears on Stan.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (echoing) And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field, keeping watch over their flock by night. And, lo, the angel of the Lord came upon them, and they were so afraid. And the angel said unto them, fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy. For born unto you this day in the city of David is a Savior, 'tis Christ the Lord. Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men. (Louder) And now, SOUTH PARK ELEMENTARY PRESENTS -- THE BIRTH OF JESUS!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Stan gestures with his hand to another area of the stage,
text: where --

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A curtain opens and we see that Wendy is dressed like Mary.
text: She is lying on her back, with her legs up in the air, moaning horrifically.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Cartman, Kenny and some other children surround her in this
text: adorable little nativity.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oooh!! Oooh!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Dressed as Joseph, Kyle stands between WendyÂ’s legs, waiting
text: for the fetus.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Come on, Mary, PUSH!! I can see its head!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: UGGHHH!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: AAGHAGAH!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Wendy pushes some more and a small, plastic blood covered
text: fetus pops out. Kyle holds it up by the head.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It's a boy!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oooh!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids all go 'Oooh!' Kenny is dressed like an angel.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mph mph mph rm!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WAIT A MINUTE!!!! WAIT, WAIT, WAIT!!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Suddenly, the lights come up and we see that we are actually
text: in the school gymnasium.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Garrison is in front of the stage, directing. He has a
text: director's megaphone and is sitting in a director's chair.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle, what the hell was that? You need to hold the baby by the legs, not by the head... What kind of sick weirdo are you?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Sorry.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: And Wendy, I'm STILL not believing the labor pains.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Just then, Kyle's irate mother walks up to Garrison.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Garrison, what the hell do you think you're doing?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, I'm TRYING to direct the school Christmas play, but YOUR son was holding baby Jesus fetus by the head.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: How DARE you include the nativity in a school play!! Don't you realize my son is JEWISH?!?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks embarrassed. Mr. Garrison looks confused.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So what makes you think he should play JOSEPH of Arimathaea?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Because it's Christmas.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Our family doesn't celebrate Christmas!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Cartman and the boys all look at each other, shocked.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, God, you're not gonna lay that Hanukkah crap on me are you?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WHAT, WHAT, WHAAATT?!?! You're not going to get away with this, Mr. Garrison!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The children stand off to the side listening to the argument.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh good, Kyle's mom is here to ruin Christmas!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Shut up, fat boy!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I'm not fat! I'm festively plump!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Why are you Jewish on Christmas, Kyle?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Meanwhile, Garrison and Kyle's mom have finished their
text: bickering.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, Okay! Kyle, is there anything you can do for the Christmas play that isn't related to Jesus?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: How about the dreidel song, boobie?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I can sing the Mr. Hankey song!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: The Mr. Hankey song? How does that go?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo! He loves me, and I love you!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Christmas poo?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What the hell is Christmas poo?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey the Christmas poo, haven't you guys ever heard of it?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle that is enough!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: See, that's what you get when you raise your child to be a pagan.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: NOW THAT DOES IT! I AM GOING STRAIGHT TO THE MAYOR ABOUT YOU MR. GARRISON!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's mother storms out. Garrison chases after her.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: OH WAIT! WAIT! WAIT! I'm sorry. Was it the pagan remark?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You guys! Look!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Wendy is standing next to the window, where big snowflakes
text: are falling.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It's snowing!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids all rush to the door.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids all run outside, where big, beautiful flakes of
text: snow are falling from the sky.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WOW! Christmas snow!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Try to catch snowflakes on your tongue, it's fun!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: VINCE GUARLDI piano MUSIC kicks in as all the kids catch
text: snowflakes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A flake lands on Stan's tongue.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A flake lands on Cartman's tongue.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny points his head up, but just then a bird flies by and
text: shits in Kenny's mouth.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: PLMPH!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: OH SICK, DUDE!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle sticks out his tongue, but --

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hey! What the hell are you doing?! Jewish people can't eat Christmas snow!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: We can too!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No, I think it's against the law, dude.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: OFFICER BARBRADY!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Barbrady is standing in an intersection, directing traffic.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: IS IT ILLEGAL FOR JEWS TO EAT CHRISTMAS SNOW?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle stares down at the ground, pouting.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: DAMMIT!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hey, come on guys, we have to go to the mall and tell Santa Claus what we want for Christmas!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah, we'll see you later, Kyle. Guess there's no reason for you to come since you don't get Christmas presents.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No, but I get Hanukkah presents for EIGHT DAYS!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Too bad it's usually a dreidel or something lame like that.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: We'll catch up with you later, Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids all start to walk away from Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Wait! I may not have Santa, but I do have Mr. Hankey the Christmas poo!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What is this about Christmas poo dude?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey. He comes out of the toilet every year and gives presents to everybody who has a lot of fiber in their diet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh Kyle, c'mon seriously, you are really reaching right now.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, you're gonna be sorry when you see me riding around on Santa's sleigh with Mr. Hankey, fat ass!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Super snooty) You're not gonna ride on Santa's sleigh 'cause you're a Jew, KYLE.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: See ya, dude.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Everyone leaves. Kyle stands there alone... Sad. Sad, soft
text: music begins.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It's hard to be a Jew on Christmas My friends won't let me join in any games And I can't sing Christmas songs Or decorate a Christmas tree Or leave water out for Rudolph 'Cause there's something wrong with me My people don't believe in Jesus Christ's Divinity I'm a Jew A lonely Jew On Christmas...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle walks over to where he sees children laughing and playing
text: and sitting on Santa's lap. Kyle watches from the distance, behind a tree.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hanukkah is nice, but why is it that Santa passes over my house every year? And instead of eating ham I have to eat kosher latkeef. Instead of Silent Night I'm singing Ooo chach to ga vive and what the fuck is up with lighting all these fucking candles tell me please! I'm a Jew A lonely Jew I'd be merry, but I'm Hebrew On Christmas.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The song ends. Kyle slowly walks away.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: It appears that the whole town has come to protest.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Everybody is AD LIBBING complaints and shouts.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The Mayor tries to quiet everybody down as she walks up to a
text: podium on the steps.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, everybody, settle down!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A random WOMAN steps up, followed by a few townmembers.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mayor, we are deeply offended by the nativity scene in front of the capital office! Church and State are SEPARATE!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Her followers cheer. The town erupts again into complaints.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle walks up to where the other boys are.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What's going on you guys?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: The whole town is pissed off at each other. It's really sweet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: That isn't all Mayor! The school play is doing a nativity scene! It isn't being sensitive to the Jewish community!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You ARE the Jewish community!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople all AD LIB shouts and complaints again.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh boy, super bitch is at it again.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Don't call my mom a bitch, Cartman!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The town Priest steps up to the front of the crowd.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mayor, the nativity is what Christmas is all about! If you remove Christ, you must remove Santa and Frosty and all that garbage too!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The Christians all cheer, some 'Boos'. The Mayor rolls her
text: eyes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: And we must put a STOP to the cutting down of Christmas trees!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: And I'm sick and tired of those little flaps on coffee lids! If you don't want to spill your coffee then you shouldn't be driving with it!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Silence... The townspeople all look around...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Finally, they all cheer again, in spite of themselves.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Quieting them again) Okay, people... Clearly we need to reach a compromise... Perhaps we need a new icon for Christmas.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The mayor makes a specific 'all encompassing' gesture with
text: her hands (see Trey).

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Ooh! Brilliant idea Mayor!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople all AD LIB agreement.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Shouting out) Hey, how about Mr. Hankey The Christmas Poo?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Everybody turns and looks at Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Cartman and Stan roll their eyes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Excuse me?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh boy, here we go again.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's Mother and Father look scared.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey. He comes out of the toilet every year and gives presents to everybody who has a lot of fiber in their diet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle, shush!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It's true! He doesn't care what faith you are! (Singing) Mr. Hankey The Christmas Poo! He loves me! And I love you! Therefore, vicariously, he loves you! Even if you're...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Don't mind him, he's a very disturbed little boy.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mph rmph rm!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Laughing) Yeah!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's mother rushes over and grabs Kyle by the arm.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, Kyle, we're leaving RIGHT NOW!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Wait!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Anyway... I'll put together a crack team of my best workers to make sure this will be the most non-offensive Christmas ever to any religious or minority group of any kind. Are there any other suggestions?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yes, Mr. Garrison?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Could we get rid of all the Mexicans?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No, Mr. Garrison, we cannot get rid of all the Mexicans.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Rats.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's house is GARISHLY decorated with Hanukkah crap. A
text: menorah has six candles lit.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Ike is entertaining himself with a dreidel.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It is SICK and disgusting and we simply will NOT HAVE IT!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Your father's right, Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle just looks down at the floor.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Sheila, let me handle this. Having imaginary friends is fine, Kyle, but this simply will NOT DO!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Listen to your father, Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Ike goes chasing after his dreidel and crashes head first
text: into the Menorah.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now, I want you repeat after me. 'There is no such thing as Mr. Hankey'.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: But dad! He always --

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: SAY IT!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (defeated) There is no such thing as Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Again.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: There's no such thing as Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: This is for your own good, boobie.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now you go brush your teeth, and march in to bed! You won't be opening your Hanukkah present tonight.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle hangs his head low and slinks into the bathroom.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Under his breath) Probably just another stupid dreidel anyway...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I said Ike's on fire.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: As Kyle leaves, his mother and father turn around and see
text: that Ike, sure enough, has caught on fire. They run over to him and cover him with a blanket.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh my God!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle stands on a little stool, brushing his teeth in the
text: mirror.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It isn't fair! I don't want to be an outcast!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: After a few seconds, Kyle hears a small noise coming from
text: the toilet... drip... drip...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks down at the toilet, then quickly looks away and
text: goes back to brushing his teeth.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hellllooo!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I'm not hearing that.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hellllooo!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Now Kyle walks over to the toilet and peers in.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Just then, from the depths of the toilet bowl, comes
text: laughable, lovable MR. HANKEY, a jolly old piece of poo with a red and white Christmas hat.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY HO!!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Hankey flies up into the air, bounces off a wall, and lands
text: on the counter.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Howdy Ho, Kyle! Gosh you're lookin' swell.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Go away, Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You know something, pal? You smell an awful lot like flowers.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I said go away. My dad says you aren't real.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Not real? Well shucks, if I weren't real, could I sing this jolly Christmas song?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Music kicks in. Mr. Hankey throws his arms up.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Singing) Santa Claus is on his way He loaded goodies on his sleigh He'll drop 'em off on Christmas Day And I'll say HOWDY HO!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: As Hankey sings, he does a little dance. Leaping all around
text: the bathroom, and leaving a small trail of brown wherever he goes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey! SHHH! I'll get in trouble!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Singing) Folks'll gather round the fire Sing a song form a choir Pretty soon they'll all retire And I'll say HOWDY HO!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: As the song continues, Hankey jumps up to the mirror and
text: writes 'Noel' in brown on it.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle? What are you doing in there?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: NOTHING!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Open this door!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I hope that Santa comes real soon been waiting since the first of June --

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey come here!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: But suddenly, the door bursts open. We see only the expression
text: on Kyle's Father's face. He is almost in shock.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Now we see what dad sees. The entire bathroom, the walls the
text: floors the mirrors, are smeared with poo.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Slowly, the camera pans to Kyle who is just standing there
text: with a lifeless, plain lump of poo in his hand.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: KYLEEEEE!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks at the piece of poo in his hand.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Say something Mr. Hankey!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's father stands at the door. Kyle is in bed. Dad flicks
text: the light off.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: NOW YOU GET TO SLEEP AND THINK ABOUT HOW YOUR POOR MOTHER HAS TO CLEAN THAT BATHROOM UP!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (very distant) Wh... Wha... WHAT Me?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's father slams the door shut.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is left alone in the darkness.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY HO!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey jumps down on the bed next to Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey! Where the hell did you go?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You should be wearing socks to sleep, Kyle. You're gonna catch a cold.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: NOBODY believes in you! Not even my friends!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Ooh, gee that's too bad...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hey, how about you come to school with me tomorrow, so I can at least prove I'm not crazy to my friends?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Say, that sounds like a swell idea! We can show everyone the true spirit of Christmas!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah! We'll show them!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey tucks himself in next to Kyle, and the two fall
text: asleep.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Establishing shot of morning on festively decorated South
text: Park avenue.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay people we've got to turn this place around! Take down anything that is offensive to any specific group!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople start taking decorations off the front of
text: the buildings.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Jimbo is on a ladder in front of his store's doorway.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Is mistletoe offensive?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Calling out) Is anyone offended by mistletoe?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: One guy in the corner raises his hand.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Lose the mistletoe!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Cartman, Stan and Kenny are waiting at the busstop.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You guys!! I'm getting that John Elway football helmet for Christmas!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: How do you know?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: 'Cause I looked in my parents closet last night!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah, well I sneaked around my mom's closet too and saw what I'm getting: The 'UltraVibe Pleasure 2000'.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What's that?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I don't know, but it sounds pretty sweet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle walks up, carrying a little shoebox.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hello, everybody!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What's in the box, Dude?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It's a surprise!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Lemme see!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, okay, but don't scare him...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Stan slowly opens the lid and peers into the box. Cartman
text: and Kenny look in as well.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is the only one smiling, the other boys look deeply
text: disturbed.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Dude! SICK!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks in the box, again Mr. Hankey is just a lump of
text: shit. No eyes, no hat, no gloves...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Is this some kind of Jewish tradition?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mph rmph rm rmph!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Wait you guys! He's alive!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle... I think you better get home and get some sleep.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (To the box) COME ON, DANCE!! DANCE!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Cartman, Stan and Kenny look at each other with deep concern.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: DANCE DAMN YOU!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The second Mayor's assistant is in a white lab coat, and
text: standing at the front of a group of people, holding a clipboard. (Is that a shitty sentence or what?)

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now, this is very simple. I'm going to say words, and the computer will measure how offended you are by them. In this way, we can find out which words are least offensive for use in the holiday season... Are we ready?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople just sit there, connected to wires and
text: computers.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Here we go... Christ.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay... CHAIR.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: CAMEL.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A few little beeps go off.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: SAND.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: STUPID WHOP DEGO.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: BENCH...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The nativity stuff has been taken down. A small crew is in
text: the process of taken down all the pictures of Santa Claus as well.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Two big guys start to drag the Christmas tree out.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, do you have to take the Christmas tree too?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mayor's orders.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The children all watch with sad eyes as their cute little
text: set is dismantled.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay children, I'm really having a hard time with our Christmas play.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The new law states we can't sing any songs having to do with
text: Jesus OR Santa Claus...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Thanks to Kyle's mother.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Shut up, Cartman!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So does anybody know any non-Santa or non-Jesus Christmas songs?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yes, Eric?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: How about we sing 'Kyle's Mom is a Stupid Bitch in D minor'.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I told you NOT to call my mom a bitch, CARTMAN!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Wellllllll.... (Singing) Kyle's mom's a bitch! She a big fat bitch! She's the biggest bitch In the whole wide world! She's a stupid bitch if there ever was a bitch She's a bitch to all the boys and girls.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Shut up, Cartman!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: As Cartman continues, Mr. Hankey hops out in front of Kyle.
text: Nobody notices except for Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Howdy ho!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Softly) Mr. Hankey!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Monday she's a bitch! On Tuesday she's a bitch! And Wednesday through Saturday She's a bitch! And then on Sunday just to be different She's a super King Kamayamaya BITCH!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Golly, that isn't very nice! I'd sure like to teach him a lesson!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle reaches for Hankey, but Hankey slips through his hands,
text: leaps off the desk and hurls himself at Cartman.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Have you ever met my friend Kyle's mom She's the biggest bitch in the whole wide world She's a mean ol' bitch and she has stupid hair, she's a bi... bi... bi... bi bitch... She's a stupid bitch. Kyle's mom's a bitch and she's a just a dirty bitch. Kyle's mom is a BITCH!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mr. Hankey, NO!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Aah!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What the...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Garrison looks down at the little lifeless lump of poo on
text: the floor.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: GROSS, KYLE!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: OH MY LORD!! KYLE, DID YOU JUST THROW DOO-DOO AT ERIC?!?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is just sitting there, wide eyed, with a big brown stain
text: on his hand.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Uhh...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The whole class erupts into AD LIB 'GROSS!'s and 'SICK's.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: YOU SICK BASTARD!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle slinks in his desk as the children all point and laugh
text: at him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is sitting in the counselor's office, facing the odd,
text: wiry counselor.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now, Kyle as your school counselor, I want to try and help you confront your problem, okay.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I don't have a problem!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well it's MY understanding that you... (checking his notes) ...You have an acute case of fecalphelia.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What's that?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, a fecalpheliac is somebody who is obsessed with mookie-stinks, Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mookie-stinks?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now, I also understand that you're Jewish, is that right Kyle?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, not on purpose!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So, this must be a pretty hard time of year for you... Being Christmas and all. Do the other kids make fun of you?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, sometimes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: And that must make you mad.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, sure.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mad enough to KILL, Kyle?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No, dude!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, that's good.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You see Kyle, sometimes we feel like an outsider, we create friends, okay? in our minds, okay?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: But Mr. Hankey seems so real.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, of course he does. In your screwed up little head he's the only friend you have.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The counselor takes a sip of his coffee. When he sets the
text: mug back down, Kyle notices that Mr. Hankey is in the mug, wearing a shower cap and brushing his back with a scrub brush. He is whistling merrily, then he waves at Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Kyle, Howdy Ho!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Right now you're nuttier than Chinese Chicken Salad, okay?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle nervously looks back to the counselor.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I mean, you're one screwed up little kid, do you understand?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The counselor takes another sip of coffee. Kyle cringes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Santa's loaded up his sleigh Soon he'll be on his merry way...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So just try to stay positive, stay away from drugs and alcohol, and in the meantime, I'm going to put you on a heavy regimen of Prozac.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Finally, the counselor looks down at his mug.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WAGAHAGHAGHA!!!! OH MY GOD YOU SICK LITTLE MONKEY!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, children, we've just received word from the Mayor that the Christmas play can't include any Christmas lights, since they offend people with epilepsy.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: So, Kenny, would you please go over and pull the light cords out of the wall?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny looks a little scared, but walks over to where the
text: HUGE mass of Christmas light wires are plugged into the wall.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Careful now Kenny, those are very very dangerous.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The children all watch on as Kenny grabs the cords and pulls
text: them out. There is a SPARK!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: But Kenny just stands there, unharmed. He sighs with relief
text: and walks back to the group.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, now let's practice our --

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No! Get away from me!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The counselor runs in, followed by innocent little Kyle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Here, just look more closely at it!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: NO!! GO AWAY!! Stan, you need to do something about your friend, okay? Get him outta here before he hurts anybody, okay?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK MENTAL INSTITUTION - DAY

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The same institution that Garrison was in episode 2.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: INT. SOUTH PARK MENTAL INSTITUTION - DAY

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The boys walk Kyle into the front office, which is decorated
text: with Christmas things. He walks up to a plain looking nurse.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hello, we need to commit our friend Kyle, please.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Reason?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I'm a clinically depressed fecalpheliac on prosaic.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Any allergies?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: No.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: JACKET!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Suddenly, two burly men in white burst out, slap a straight-
text: jacket on Kyle and drag him away.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Bye, Kyle! Happy Hanukkah!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids are all dressed in festive costumes, darting around
text: and getting ready for their big night.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, children, does everyone have their leotards on?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: It appears the entire town has turned out for the Christmas
text: Play. The townspeople all fill the bleachers in anticipation.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Good, it looks like they've taken the Christmas trees down.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yes, and there's nothing Christian either. This should be great.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Sniffling) Oh, this could be such a wonderful Christmas play. I wish our little Kyle was here to see it.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is in an all white padded cell wearing his all white
text: straight jacket.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Singing) Dreidel, dreidel, dreidel I made you out of clay Dreidel, dreidel, dreidel With dreidel I will play. Second verse, same as the first! Dreidel, dreidel, dreidel...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople sit in the bleachers.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Welcome to the South Park Elementary Holiday.....

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Wait wait!! There's a star above the stage! That's very offensive to non- Christians!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, come on!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HEY! Don't push your beliefs on ME buddy!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I agree!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, brother... Kenny would you please climb that ladder and take down the star above the stage?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny nervously looks over to a rickety old ladder.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Like a trooper, Kenny walks over and takes the first few
text: steps.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: And be careful not to fall in that little pool below you Kenny, the shark for the third act is in there.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny looks down and sees that there is indeed a huge
text: maneating shark in the pool below him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mmph!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the South Park Elementary Holiday EXPERIENCE!! Before we bring out the kiddies for the play here's a nonoffensive, non-denominational Holiday song by the school Chef!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople applaud. Chef takes the stage as MUSIC begins.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I'm gonna lay you down by the yule log I'm gonna love you right Baby, I'm gonna deck your halls And silent your night...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny shakes a bit at the top of the ladder. He looks down
text: and sees the ominous shark below him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You'll hear the herald angels sing when I'm sliding off your bra. I Just can't wait to jingle your bells and Fa La La your La! Baby it's Christmas!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I wish Kyle was here, it just doesn't seem right without him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, old Kyle is going to be locked up for a while, so get used to it.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay kids, get ready to take your places.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Thank you Chef. And now South Park Elementary presents the happy non- offensive non-denominational Christmas play! With music and lyrics by New York minimalist composer Phillip Glass!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Phillip glass stands at his keyboard and waves.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Stan, Cartman, Kenny and all the other kids take the stage
text: in their drab, brown outfits.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The extremely lame and gay Phillip Glass music starts.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The boys and girls all start to sing.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: AS I TURN AND LOOK INTO THE SUN, THE RAYS BURN MY EYES HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY EVERYBODY'S HAPPY.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOW LIKE A TURTLE THE SUN LOOKS...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What the hell is this? This is horrible!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: This is the most god-awful piece of crap I've ever seen!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hey! YOU'RE the ones who made it this way!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah! It's because the Jews said it couldn't be Christian!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: It wasn't our idea to take out Santa Claus!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: ALL YOU BASTARDS RUINED CHRISTMAS.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople all lash out at each other. In a fury, they
text: charge and start beating the crap out of one another.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Get him in the ribs.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Damn tree hugger!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The children just look on helplessly as their parents fight
text: like dogs.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: This sucks, dude. This is like the worst Christmas I've ever seen!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Say, where's Kyle?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: We committed him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What? Why?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: 'Cause he kept seeing this little brown piece of Christmas poo everywhere that he went.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Christmas Poo? You mean Mr. Hankey?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Huh? Uh-Oh!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A wholesome, pretty mother walks into the dining room, where
text: her two kids, a ten year old BOY and an eight year old GIRL are looking bored at the table.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Say kids, why the long faces?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: We're bored.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: There's nothin' to do.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, maybe this will help!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The mother pulls a box out from nowhere. It is a very colorful
text: box with Mr. Hankey on the front.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: WOW! MR. HANKEY CONSTRUCTION SET!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: COOL!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: That's right, kids, now you can make your very own Mr. Hankey!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The girl dumps the box out onto the table.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The kids and mom are kneeled down by the toilet bowl.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Just use this special fecal fishing net, and select your best Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: That one!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The mom dips the little fishing net into the toilet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Then use the hand-crafted Hankey- stand to add whatever eyes, mouths and hats you want!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The little girl puts the finishing touches on a little Mr.
text: Hankey, perched on a wooden platform.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I made a mariachi Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Now it's a Mrs. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Let's put the fez hat on him.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I wish daddy was still alive.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: The Mr. Hankey construction set comes with everything seen here.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Hey, where's Mr. Hankey?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The baby claps its hands and laughs, covered in brown
text: (chocolate, of course).

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I love you sweetheart.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I love you too.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The mother laughs merrily with her children.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: This is horrible. Everybody's fighting and my best friend is in an institution... All because we didn't believe in Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, you can believe in him now.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Two parents go hurling through frame, beating the shit out
text: of each other.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I believe!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I believe in Mr. Hankey!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY HO!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The boys all turn to see Mr. Hankey! Who has flipped out of
text: his shoebox and is magically floating in the air.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY FOLKS! Gosh you sure do smell nice and flowery!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Whoa!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Howdy Ho, Chef!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Howdy Ho, Mr. Hankey.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Okay, that does it. Screw you guys, I'm going home. Talking poo is where I draw the line.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: What's all the ruckus?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I'm glad your here Mr. Hankey, the whole town is about to kill each other.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Stan and Cartman watch this exchange with open mouths and
text: wide eyes.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I reckon this could be a job for Mr. Hankey!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople are all still beating the shit out of each
text: other, when suddenly, they hear a loud whistle.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: STOP FIGHTING!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Everybody turns and sees little Mr. Hankey standing on the
text: edge of the stage.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh my God, what the hell is that thing?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Come on, gang, don't fight!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople look at each other.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You people have focused so hard on the things wrong with Christmas, that you've forgotten what's so right about it! Don't you see? This is the one time of year we're supposed to forget all the bad stuff. Stop being sad about the state of world... And for just one day, say 'Oh to heck with it! Let's sing and dance and bake cookies!'

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The townspeople just sit there. In shock.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Finally, the sound of one person clapping echoes in the
text: distance. Everyone turns to see Kyle's father, clapping softly, but slowly getting louder and faster.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle's Father claps even harder and then a few people join
text: in... Then more people join in.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Finally the whole auditorium erupts into glorious applause.
text: They stand and cheer.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Dude, this is pretty fucked up right here.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: INT. SOUTH PARK MENTAL INSTITUTION - DAY

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle is sitting in his padded cell all alone. A very sad
text: Christmas.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Softly) I'm a Jew A lonely Jew But... what's that?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: JINGLE BELLS are heard in the distance. Kyle picks his head
text: up and looks around.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: A little figure drops onto the windowsill.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY HO, KYLE!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Oh, no! I'm not sane yet.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: I brought some friends with me!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Friends?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Suddenly, the whole place illuminates with colorful lights
text: and festive voices.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks down out of his window and sees that the ENTIRE
text: TOWN has come and gathered in front of the mental institution. Kyle can't believe his eyes -- EVERYBODY is there with candles, trees, lights and joy.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: MERRY CHRISTMAS KYLE BROFLOVSKI!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You mean you can see him?! I'M NOT CRAZY?!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle runs outside and joins the group, just as they all join
text: hands and start to sing.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Singing) Mr. Hankey, The Christmas Poo! He loves me! I love you! Therefore, vicariously, he loves you! Even if you're a Jew!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey bounces over and gives Kyle a big kiss. Kyle
text: laughs, in spite of himself.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Sometimes he's nutty! Sometimes he's corny! He can be brown or greenish brown! But if you eat fiber Christmas Eve He Might come to your town!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey stands on top of a roof and starts tossing out
text: presents to all the townspeople.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: MR. HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO, HE LOVES ME, I LOVE YOU.....

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey jumps back down on the ground, and then starts
text: hopping away.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, I've got a LONG night ahead of me!! BYE, BYE! AND MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Goodbye Mr. Hankey! Bring me lots of presents! I always believed in you!!!

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: HOWDY HO, HO, HO...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Mr. Hankey crosses a full moon and disappears.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: You know, I learned something today. I learned that Jewish people are OK, and that Hanukkah can be cool too.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah, you know... It seems like something's still not right...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kyle looks around and focuses on Kenny, who is just standing
text: there, looking fine.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Yeah... Something feels unfinished.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The boys look at Kenny. Kenny starts to look a little nervous.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Well, what could it be?

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: The boys stare at Kenny as a TITLE FADES UP

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Kenny puts his arms up in victory and jumps up and down with
text: the merriest holiday cheer ever.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: Mmmf mrrr rmmmm.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: EXT. SOUTH PARK PUBLIC ACCESS STATION - NIGHT

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Jesus sits at a large rectangular table (a la the last supper
text: table) which is decorated with birthday goodies, on the set of 'Jesus and Pals'.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Several places are set, but the chairs are empty.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Jesus sits sadly in the middle with a birthday hat on his
text: head, singing softly to himself.

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
text: (Sadly) Happy birthday to me... Happy birthday to me...

title: MR  HANKEY THE CHRISTMAS POO
role: Jesus sighs and blows out his candles.
